item.title: House Democrats Press for Vote to Bar Military Action in Venezuela

item.title: Paramount, Comcast and Netflix Prepare Bids for Warner Bros. Discovery
item.description: Paramount, Comcast and Netflix are preparing bids to buy all or part of Warner Bros. Discovery, a crown jewel of the industry.

item.title: Is a 50-year mortgage really that much crazier than a 30-year one?
item.description: Last week, the internet piled on President Trump's proposal for a 50-year mortgage. But maybe it's not as crazy as it sounds.
